name: Cure Wounds
summary: Touch a creature to restore hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier.
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Fireball
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
summary: Unleash a 20-foot-radius explosion that deals 8d6 fire damage.
description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose, blossoming with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Mage Armor
components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)
summary: Protect a willing creature with AC equal to 13 + its Dexterity modifier.
description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

name: Magic Missile
summary: Create darts of force that automatically strike for 1d4 + 1 damage each.
description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage. The darts all strike simultaneously and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

name: Shield
summary: A shimmering barrier grants you +5 AC until the start of your next turn.
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.
